scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm start" && mongo myapp --eval "db.destinations.drop()" && mongoimport --db myapp --collection destinations --file server/database/myapp.destinations.json
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm start" && mongo myapp --eval "db.trips.drop()" && mongoimport --db myapp --collection trips --file server/database/myapp.trips.json
